item.title: Extra time for peers to debate assisted dying
item.description: The assisted dying bill is allocated further sessions after a record number of amendments in the House of Lords.

item.title: Owners of properties worth more than £2m in England face 'mansion tax'
item.description: The surcharge begins at £2,500, rising to £7,500 for properties valued at more than £5m.

item.title: Georgia judge dismisses 2020 election interference case against Trump
item.description: The state charges were the last remaining criminal case against the US president stemming from the 2020 election.

item.title: We make £100,000. The cut to cash Isa limit is a big blow
item.description: BBC News hears from people with a range of incomes about what they think of the Budget.

item.title: Key measures from this year's Budget at-a-glance
item.description: Changes to tax, pensions and welfare - here’s what you need to know from Rachel Reevesher second Budget.
